articles.author: Fatima Al-Kassab
articles.title: The U.K. hands Chagos Islands over to Mauritius but says it will secure a U.S. base - NPR
articles.description: The Chagos Islands are in the middle of the Indian Ocean and home to a strategic military base on Diego Garcia.
articles.content: LONDON The United Kingdom has signed a deal to hand over sovereignty of the Chagos Islands to Mauritius, in an agreement Britain says will also ensure the future of a strategically important U.S. mil… [+4123 chars]
